mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, password, name, contact, email, birthdate, address, gender) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{contact}, #{email}, #{birthdate}, #{address}, #{gender});
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, password, name, contact, email, birthdate, address, gender FROM users;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId};

SELECT user_id, name, contact, email, birthdate, address, gender FROM users WHERE TRIM(name) = TRIM(#{name}) AND REPLACE(contact, '-', '') = #{contact} AND LOWER(TRIM(email)) = LOWER(TRIM(#{email})) LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND LOWER(email) = LOWER(#{email}) LIMIT 1
